aka: The Dentist and the Northern Boy

cast.name: 吉拉育·坎塔永 Max Jirayut Kanthayot
塔纳帕特·塔纳查坤皮桑 Thanapat Thanachakulphisan

this_title: เดือนอิงดอย เล่ม
trans_title: The Dentist and the Northern Boy
introduction: 过去，“塔吉特”只看到他的朋友(他)片面地爱着，尽管现在“拉温”有了一个情人。看来这段友谊的爱情会继续下去。但是Techit仍然对其他人没有兴趣。他想继续爱他最好的朋友，即使没有希望！直到他遇到了长得不错的‘奇莉’，就像一个王室成员，一些感情渐渐淡去。形成于他的心在对方总是围着他转的时候，用一张不像大小狗的脸呵护着他……似乎他一直在独自追逐爱情。这一次，这个泰医生将成为一个被爱情追逐的人。~~改编自哈士奇洪德的小说，由everY出版。In the past, 'Tachit' had only watched his friend (that he) loved one-sidedly even though now 'Rawin' had a lover in person. And it seems that this friendship's love will go on well. But Techit still has no interest in anyone else.He want to continue to love his best friend even without hope!  Until he meets 'Kiri' who looks good, like a royal family, some feelings gradually fade away.Formed in his heart when the other party was always surrounded by him, caring for him with a face that was not unlike a big puppy… It seemed that he had been chasing for love alone. This time, this doctor Tae will become someone who is being chased by love.~~ Adapted from the novel by huskyhund, published by everY.
foreign_title: เดือนอิงดอย เล่ม
